item.description:
Dear Spiritual Friends,

How are you?

First of all, Happy Chinese New Year to you and your love one.

It is time for us get together, share more and learn from each other.

Hope you can join me.

Â 

Have a peaceful day

Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: It will be the second building on the right when you drive into condo, you can park with visitor parking sign. You can call my cell at 617-223-7166
item.name: Westborough Spirituality February Meetup
